replies.author: Darkyoooooo
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 Darkyoooooo 于 2014-10-31 23:30 编辑 

Main要加上你的包 mc1.LZ

replies.author: a8105

replies.txt_content: 你的plugin.yml没有声明你的Main class路径

replies.author: weekdaylove
replies.txt_content: plugin.yml放到 源包下面还有你这么写plugin.yml里main应该是mc1.LZ

replies.author: mfq199748
replies.txt_content: plugin.yml里面的main参数应该是完整包路径指向的继承JavaPlugin的主类路径。

replies.author: mfq199748
replies.txt_content:
mfq199748 发表于 2015-12-10 21:25
plugin.yml里面的main参数应该是完整包路径指向的继承JavaPlugin的主类路径。
而且应该放在src外部。。
